descendants.content: @Vaniaji @Snowshadow Transportation gets impacted, too. Hurricanes and storms shut down shipping routes, damage and destroy roads and other infrastructure, damage the shipments themselves, and sometimes cause food to be completely lost, either in transit or in homes due to loss of power.

card.title: No, a Republican strategist didn't invent the term 'climate change'
card.description: The Green Party tweeted out the incorrect information Wednesday but corrected it after an inquiry from National Observer.

descendants.content:
@TonyStark
I noticed that also. It was rather disappointing because I had heard it was better here. One "plus" about here is that when there is misinfo/disinfo being purposely spread, and someone is having trouble arguing against it, usually more than one person will jump in and settle the dispute with facts and sources.
Of course mistakes happen, no one is perfect, but most people will listen and edit or delete erroneous posts.
@wolfincheapclothing @AWolfInCheapClothing @gemelliz @GottaLaff
